vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἀκύλας, -ου (and -α; MM, VGT, see word), ὁ (Lat.),
Aquila: Act.18:2, 18 18:26, Rom.16:3, 1Co.16:19, 2Ti.4:19.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.18.2; married to Priscilla (G4252)
§ Aquila, "eagle"
Aquila, (Proper name), Paul's friend and Priscilla's husband, Acts 18:2, 18, 26; Rom. 16:3; 1Cor. 16:19; 2Tim. 4:19*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞居拉 这个陽性專有名詞在拉丁文的意思是 "鷹"
一個本都的猶太人, 以製帳篷為業的基督徒, 伴隨保羅一起傳揚基督的道理
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚居拉 这个阳性专有名词在拉丁文的意思是 "鹰"
一个本都的犹太人, 以制帐篷为业的基督徒, 伴随保罗一起传扬基督的道理
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: A-qui-la « Chim ó ». Vợ ông tên là Bết-rít-xin, gọi cách thân mật là Bơ-rít-ca.
